
**请求**

1. 如果分享的名片信息有v3, v4信息，需要加ticket字段

 ``` 
 {
  "data": {
    "remark": "验证消息",
    "source_type": 17,
    "wxid": "v3_020b3826fd03010000000000e1820359ae0938000000501ea9a3dba12f95f6b60a0536a1adb6fa6a0e1df72ba1b8216d331676bbd154d3e07f25e50734c111d9199a00524feeb2f831b0ca3b2ea8ff56bf4d19206afbc4fa514d83954e90470251a484@stranger",
    "ticket": "v4_@stranger"
  },
  "type": 11062
} 

 ```
2. 如果只有wxid，不需要传ticket字段

 ``` 
 {
  "data": {
    "remark": "验证消息",
    "source_type": 17,
    "wxid": "wxid_xxxxx"
  },
  "type": 11062
} 

 ```




**返回**

 ``` 
 {
  "data": {
    "errcode": -2,  // 0成功
    "errmsg": "发送朋友验证失败。",
    "status": 1,
    "wxid": "wxid_7nexxxxxxxx"
  },
  "type": 11062
} 

 ```
